simulator.payloads

Class NetworkScheduler.Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.payloads.NetworkScheduler.Connection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkConnection
    Enclosing class:
    NetworkScheduler

    public class NetworkScheduler.Connection
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkConnection
    Allows elevator components to send and receive messages through the network.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  NetworkScheduler.Connection.RepeatedPayload
      A task that periodically enqueues a specified message for transmission.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerEventTriggered(ReadablePayload rpayload)
      Registers the specified message object to be updated with the data of any message of the same type that is sent over this network, and the connected component's corresponding Networkable.receive(simulator.payloads.ReadablePayload) method will be called.
      void registerTimeTriggered(ReadablePayload writeback)
      Registers the specified message object to be updated silently with the data of any message of the same type that is sent over this network.
      void sendOnce(WriteablePayload message)
      Enqueues the specified message for broadcast.
      void sendTimeTriggered(WriteablePayload wpayload, SimTime period)
      Causes the specified message to be sent once during every subsequent period of period microseconds.
      void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Sets whether this connection sends and receives any messages to and from the network.
      java.lang.String toString()

        public void registerTimeTriggered(ReadablePayload writeback)
        Registers the specified message object to be updated silently with the data of any message of the same type that is sent over this network.
        Specified by:
        registerTimeTriggered in interface NetworkConnection

      • registerEventTriggered

        public void registerEventTriggered(ReadablePayload rpayload)
        Registers the specified message object to be updated with the data of any message of the same type that is sent over this network, and the connected component's corresponding Networkable.receive(simulator.payloads.ReadablePayload) method will be called.
        Specified by:
        registerEventTriggered in interface NetworkConnection

      • sendTimeTriggered

        public void sendTimeTriggered(WriteablePayload wpayload,
                     SimTime period)
        Causes the specified message to be sent once during every subsequent period of period microseconds.
        Specified by:
        sendTimeTriggered in interface NetworkConnection
        Parameters:
        period - the period on which to send this message, specified in microseconds

      • sendOnce

        public void sendOnce(WriteablePayload message)
        Enqueues the specified message for broadcast.
        Specified by:
        sendOnce in interface NetworkConnection

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether this connection sends and receives any messages to and from the network. If this connection is disabled, the connected component will not receive any time-triggered or event-triggered messages through this connection, and all messages it tries to send will be silently dropped.
        Specified by:
        setEnabled in interface NetworkConnection

        public java.lang.String toString()
